straw.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: the dried stems of wheat or similar plants that animals sleep on, and that are used for making things such as baskets, hats etc
straw.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a single dried stem of straw
straw.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a thin tube of paper or plastic for sucking up liquid from a bottle or a cup
straw.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: She sipped her lemonade through a straw.
